bibl.title: Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph 11 â€“ Preliminary Reports on the 1994-1995 to 1998-1999 Field Seasons
bibl.note: Remains of a temple archive (?). The fragments offer glimpses of insight into matters of dating, onomastics and offices related to both the Roman government and to the temple of Tutu in the IIIrd and IVth cent. A.D.
WORP Klaas A., Short Texts from the Main Temple.

Colin A. HOPE and Gillian E. BOWEN (Edd.), Dakhleh Oasis Project: Preliminary Reports on the 1994-1995 to 1998-1999 Field Seasons = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 11 (Oxford - Oakville, Connecticut, 2002) pp. 333-349, 13 figg.
